messages.content: Emily Sanders works with Michael Clark.

Karen West works with Bryan Torres.
Bryan Torres is a colleague of Bryan Jordan.
Bryan Jordan works with Deborah Morgan.
Deborah Morgan is a colleague of Brittany Powell.

queries.question: Are Emily Sanders and Brittany Powell related to each other at work through colleagues relations?

reference_answer.text: Yes, they are indirect colleagues according to their graph relations.
